element.name: DESCRIPTION
element.text: This tool calculates total volumes for one layer of elevations. Four alternatives exist to evaluate the total volume based on how the volumes above and below a base elevation level are considered.

element.name: METHOD
element.text: the method to be used may be selected from the following: * Only volumes over base level. Will only sum up the volumes over base level. The ones below base level will be ignored. * Only volumes below base level. Will only sum up volumes below base level. Volumes over base level will be ignored. * Add the volumes over base level and subtract the volumes below it. * Add volumes both over and below base level. The volumes over and below the base level are both summed up. Both have a positive sign.

element.name: VOL
element.text: Vlolumes are expressed in the same units as the layer cell size.
